Benchmark.title: Automatically generated XCCDF from OVAL file: xenial-apparmor-oval.xml
Benchmark.description: This file has been generated automatically from oval definitions file.

Rule.title: Check that Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) is installed.
Rule.description: Confirm that the host is part of the unix family and is running Ubuntu xenial.

Rule.title: Confirm that a version of AppArmor older than 2.12 is not present.
Rule.description: Earlier versions incorrectly handle unknown AppArmor profiles in AppArmor init scripts, upstart jobs, and/or systemd unit files.
